friendly_name.description: A user-friendly name associated with the phone number for easy identification.

phone_number.description: The toll-free phone number that can be used for communication.

lata.description: The Local Access and Transport Area code of the phone number's location.

rate_center.description: The rate center associated with the phone number.

latitude.description: The latitude coordinate of the phone number's location.

longitude.description: The longitude coordinate of the phone number's location.

locality.description: The locality (city/town) where the phone number is located.

region.description: The region (state/province) where the phone number is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code of the phone number's location.

iso_country.description: The ISO country code of the phone number's location.

address_requirements.description: Specifies the requirements related to the address associated with the phone number.

beta.description: Indicates if the phone number is in beta testing phase.

capabilities.description: Represents the capabilities of the toll-free phone numbers available

voice.description: Indicates if the phone number supports voice calls.

SMS.description: Indicates if the phone number supports Short Message Service (text messaging).

MMS.description: Indicates if the phone number supports Multimedia Messaging Service.

fax.description: Indicates if the phone number supports fax communication.
